detalles: Explore sampling distributions of several statistics computed with samples taken from arbitrary mixtures of probability distributions.
A Shiny application to play with simple linear regression fit via Least Squares method.
The main interactve vizualisation is produced with \pkg{D3} and made available via \pkg{r2d3}.
Vizualise and tune univariate mathematical functions.
This project was created to show the functionality and versatility of \ pkg {shinymath}.
A simple Whack-A-Mole game based on the original version made by \href{https://wesbos.com/}{\underline{Wes Bos}} as part of his \href{https://javascript30.com/}{\underline{Javascript 30}} challenge.
An entire system to manage and run a Bingo game made in \pkg{Shiny}.
This app was created for a club in my community and thus is written in Spanish.
The version they use is a desktop app created with \pkg{Electron}.
